ideas.title: I love ideas 💡
ideas.body: Don't you just 💖ideas, they make the 🌍 go round.

ideas.title: The best idea 💡
ideas.body: Use emoji characters in the text for the idea, it makes everything look even nicer. 💪

ideas.title: 🤜 abuse emojis 🤛
ideas.body: Build a rocket 🚀 drive a fast car 🚗 climb a tree 🌳 eat great food 🍩 enjoy some drinks 🥂 love a lot 💝 and enjoy life. 🌍
